meta.title: Samarth Anand Borade | AI Engineer & Computer Science Graduate
meta.description: Portfolio website showcasing AI engineering projects, machine learning research, and full-stack development work

about.bio: AI Engineer and Computer Science graduate student at USC with expertise in machine learning, full-stack development, and research. Passionate about building AI-powered applications and contributing to cutting-edge research in automated systems and data science.
focus: Developing AI-powered applications and intelligent systems
Building full-stack web applications with modern technologies
Conducting research in machine learning and automated classification systems

experience.title: AI Engineer Intern
experience.description: Accelerated development of a platform for AI Agents and agentic frameworks including RAG, RLHF, and LLM applications across industries such as insurance, logistics, and finance. Played a key role in increasing company's valuation to $2.4 million within three months.
achievements: Developed 40+ AI agents and worked on core packages for the platform
Focused on integrating LLMs into practical applications across multiple industries
Contributed to significant company growth and valuation increase

experience.title: Data Scientist Intern
experience.description: Interned in the Data Science team, gaining practical skills in Power BI, dashboards, DAX language, and advanced Python. Analyzed logistics data to optimize transportation, warehousing, and distribution processes.
achievements: Achieved 10% improvement in delivery efficiency through data analysis
Reduced operational delays by 15% through process optimization
Built comprehensive dashboards for logistics performance monitoring

projects.title: OMNI.ai - Powered Website Generator
projects.description: Full-stack app that converts natural language prompts into live websites with real-time in-browser code execution and preview using WebAssembly-powered WebContainer, all in under 2 minutes.
projects.longDescription: Built a comprehensive website generation platform that leverages AI to transform natural language descriptions into fully functional websites. The system uses WebAssembly-powered WebContainer for real-time code execution and preview, enabling users to see their websites come to life instantly.
highlights: Support for multiple AI models (GPT, Claude, Groq, Ollama)
Complete website generation in under 2 minutes

projects.title: SynthMaster - AI Dataset Creation Tool
projects.description: Synthetic dataset creation tool integrating over 50 conversational formats across various LLMs with customizable GPU and cloud selection options.
projects.longDescription: Developed a comprehensive tool for creating synthetic datasets with support for over 50 different conversational formats. The platform offers flexibility in model choice, GPU selection, and cloud deployment options, making it highly versatile for various AI training scenarios.

projects.title: DataSculptor - LLM Dataset Curator
projects.description: Tool for cleaning and curating 20+ LLM-generated datasets with PII detection, toxicity filtering, and semantic search capabilities.
projects.longDescription: Engineered a sophisticated data curation platform that automatically cleans and processes LLM-generated datasets. The tool incorporates advanced features like PII detection, toxicity filtering, language identification, and semantic search to ensure high-quality, safe datasets for AI model training.
highlights: Toxicity filtering across thousands of records

projects.title: ChatZilla - NLP Data Query System
projects.description: NLP-based assistant capable of querying data from structured formats like Excel and CSV files using LLMs for data interpretation.
projects.longDescription: Created an intelligent data query system that uses natural language processing to interact with structured data files. The system leverages LLMs to interpret and analyze data from Excel and CSV files, making data analysis more accessible through conversational interfaces.
highlights: Support for Excel and CSV formats

projects.title: WHO - Voice Identification System
projects.description: CNN-based system to identify speakers from 3-second audio clips using spectrograms with data augmentation on 500+ audio samples.
projects.longDescription: Developed a sophisticated voice identification system using Convolutional Neural Networks. The system analyzes spectrograms generated from short audio clips to accurately identify speakers, with robust data augmentation techniques applied to enhance model performance and accuracy.

projects.title: Simulation Operations Dashboard
projects.description: Power BI dashboard with machine learning forecasting for monthly data trends to support operational planning.
projects.longDescription: Built a comprehensive 8-page Power BI dashboard featuring advanced visualizations including bar graphs, line charts, and interactive slicers. The dashboard incorporates machine learning models for trend forecasting and enables users to explore data at granular levels for informed decision-making.

projects.title: Dynamic Price Scoring System
projects.description: Sales performance evaluation tool using dynamic pricing strategies, analyzing 10,000+ transactions for revenue optimization.
projects.longDescription: Developed an advanced pricing optimization system that evaluates sales performance and customer behavior through dynamic pricing strategies. The system analyzes market demand and supply metrics from over 10,000 transactions to optimize pricing decisions and improve competitiveness.

education.degree: Master of Science in Computer Science
Bachelor of Technology in Computer Engineering
education.institution: SVKM's Mukesh Patel School of Technology Management
SVKM's Mukesh Patel School of Technology Management

research.title: Automated Classification of Musical Genres: A Machine Learning Approach with Random Forest and Feature Engineering
research.publisher: Springer ICRTCIS 2024 proceedings (Algorithms for Intelligent Systems series)
research.description: Published research on automated classification of musical genres using Random Forest and feature engineering techniques.

articles.title: Welcome to the AI Wonderland Series
articles.description: Initiated a series of articles aimed at demystifying complex AI concepts, focusing on LLMs and Generative AI.

articles.title: Power BI Articles Series
articles.description: Published a series with ~16.8k views; featured by the Microsoft Power BI publication.
